properties.areaDesc: Lake Huron from 5NM east of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Lt  to the US/Canadian border beyond 5 NM from shore; Lake Huron from Sturgeon Point to Alabaster MI 5NM off shore to US/Canadian border; Lake Huron from Presque Isle Lt. to Sturgeon Point  MI 5NM off shore to US/Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 17 at 10:18AM EST until January 18 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...During the Gale Warning, expect sustained winds up to 28
knots from the southeast with gusts up to 36 knots. The largest
significant waves will be 10 feet with a potential maximum wave
height of 14 feet.

* WHERE...Northern and central Lake Huron.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 11 AM EST
Saturday with the largest waves expected around 12 PM EST
Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM EST SATURDAY
